Title: MediaBrowser Manager
Description: MediaBrowser Manager (mbm) makes it easier for MediaBrowser users to maintain local media libraries and metadata. MBM gives full control over your local media metadata, and can sync with internet media metadata providers.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MediaBrowser Manager (mbm) makes it easier for MediaBrowser users to maintain local media libraries and metadata. MBM gives full control over your local media metadata, and can sync with internet media metadata providers.


**Super early technology preview is in the owen**

MediaBrowser Manager is under development.
A super-early technology preview will be released soon. Stay tuned.
